entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
